snippet: A statement from Saints Coach Sean Payton and General Manager Mickey Loomis promised that no bounty system would be allowed again.
abstract: New Orleans Saints general manager Mickey Loomis and coach Sean Payton finally acknowledge the NFL's investigation into the team's bounty system, which paid players to injure opponents; issue a statement promising that it will not happen again.
lead_paragraph: A statement from Saints Coach Sean Payton and General Manager Mickey Loomis promised that no bounty system would be allowed again.

headline.seo: Saints’ Coach and G.M. Acknowledge Bounty Inquiry
headline.main: Saints’ Coach and G.M. Accept Responsibility on Bounties
headline.print_headline: Saints’ Coach and G.M. Accept Responsibility on Bounties
